bibl.title: Eine Neuedition von P.Berl. Cohen 8.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: New edition of the sale of an ass from Kerkesoucha P. Berl. Cohen 8, which gives new weight to the text in regard to the discussion of the process of centralization of the activities of the state notaries in the Arsinoite nome at the end of the II cent. CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Dieter Hagedorn & Fabian Reiter, Eine Neuedition von P.Berl. Cohen 8.

New edition of the sale of an ass from Kerkesoucha P. Berl. Cohen 8, which gives new weight to the text in regard to the discussion of the process of centralization of the activities of the state notaries in the Arsinoite nome at the end of the II cent. CE. - Avec résumé en anglais.
